content: अपलप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To deny, disown; राजदेयमपलपितं <ls>Kull.</ls> on <ls>Ms. 8. 400</ls>; refuse; शतमपलपति <ls>P. I. 3. 44</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} To conceal, hide. {@--3@} To detract from, slander. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To outwit, overreach, deceive; अपलापयमानस्य शत्रूंस्तस्याभवन्मतिः <ls>Bk. 8. 44.</ls>
